checkbox.title: Checkbox
checkbox.subtitle: Checkbox component for selecting one or multiple values with support for indeterminate state, grouping and customization

argTypes.modelValue: Checkbox value (true/false or custom value via trueValue/falseValue)
argTypes.disabled: Disables checkbox, making it unavailable for interaction
argTypes.label: Text label displayed next to checkbox
argTypes.value: Checkbox value when used in group (CheckboxGroup)
argTypes.trueValue: Custom value that will be used when checkbox is selected
argTypes.falseValue: Custom value that will be used when checkbox is not selected
argTypes.variant: Checkbox style variant: outlined (with border) or filled (filled)
argTypes.name: Name attribute for input element (used for grouping in forms)
argTypes.id: Unique element identifier (generated automatically if not specified)
argTypes.ariaLabel: ARIA label for accessibility (alternative to label for screen readers)
argTypes.ariaLabelledby: ID of element that serves as label for checkbox (ARIA)
argTypes.focus: Event fired when checkbox receives focus
argTypes.blur: Event fired when checkbox loses focus
argTypes.change: Event fired when checkbox state changes

basic.title: Basic Example
basic.description: Standard checkbox in basic state without label

withLabel.title: With Label
withLabel.description: Checkbox with text label displayed to the right of the element. Label is set by the `label` property

filled.title: Filled Style
filled.description: Checkbox with filled background instead of standard outline. Set by `variant="filled"` property

size.title: Size
size.description: Checkbox size is controlled by the `size` property. Available values: `sm` (small), `lg` (large). Medium size is used by default

indeterminate.title: Indeterminate State
indeterminate.description: Checkbox in indeterminate state (partially selected), used for group operations. Activated by `indeterminate` property. Useful for implementing "select all" in checkbox groups

disabled.title: Disabled State
disabled.description: Checkbox in inactive state, unavailable for interaction. Set by `disabled` property. Can be either selected or unselected

invalid.title: Error State
invalid.description: Checkbox in error state with red border. Activated by `invalid` property. Used to display validation errors in forms

group.title: Checkbox Group
group.description: `CCheckboxGroup` component for managing multiple checkboxes. Supports horizontal and vertical orientation via `orientation` property. Value is an array of selected values

customIcon.title: Custom Icon
customIcon.description: Checkbox with custom icon instead of standard checkmark. Icon is configured through `icon` slot, which receives `checked`, `indeterminate` and `iconClass` parameters

customLabel.title: Custom Label
customLabel.description: Checkbox with custom label content via `default` slot. Allows using HTML markup, icons or other components instead of plain text

customValues.title: Custom Values
customValues.description: Checkbox with custom values instead of standard `true`/`false`. Configured via `trueValue` and `falseValue` properties. Useful for working with APIs that use other data types

form.title: In Form
form.description: Integration with `CFormItem`: validation of checkbox group, displaying error message
